segments.text: I notice the woman at the sink, absorbed in her task.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's polishing that plate like it's the most important thing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the water from the faucet is spilling over, making a huge puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's going to ruin the floor and cabinets if it keeps up.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She has no idea, standing right in the middle of it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy on the stool is reaching for cookies secretly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister's waiting eagerly beside him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That stool looks so unstable; he might tumble down.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It makes me worry about them getting hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The open window lets in light from the tidy garden.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Everything outside seems perfect, unlike this risky scene inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the mom turns around soon to stop this.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's heartbreaking to think of the accident that could happen.
segments.speaker: PAR
